NAME: VOS Independent
DESCRIPTION: Third party support ships that are not recruited by a national meteorological service but contribute to the VOS Scheme

NAME: VOS NMHS Cooperative
DESCRIPTION: Ships that are recruited by a national meteorological service but use own instruments, sensors and equipment

NAME: VOS NMHS Operated
DESCRIPTION: Ships that are recruited by a national meteorological service which also supplies the necessary observing instruments, sensors and equipment
